post.body: Welcome to twitter! Now, you can follow how often my dog farts! :)
I love how the south panics at the sight of 2 snowflakes :)
haha.. ok, we'll wait for you :)
I actually DO know how to spell opossum, thank you very much! :)
I was playing Guitar Hero: World Tour. :)
thanks! I can't wait for the DMV on monday. Blah!
I know right! They aren't gonna be able to do much with it, except make a good facade for a stolen vehicle.
haha... nope, was parked at a meter in downtown Los Angeles.
What would you use 1 license plate for in a state that requires 2? It's about $18 to replace the plates.
Same here. We have to have plates on front and back. So now, it's just an inconvenience to go to the DMV to get another one.
ARG! I will hurt you!... seriously though, I wanna punch somebody.
Ok, Kanye West can't carry a tune. He's lucky he has a good beat to his songs, cuz his SNL performance is painful.
Just got home from the whale's vagina.
In a whale's vagina.
The scent of this elevator reminds me of elementary school.
Now taking applications for sugar daddy...
Of course my car needs maintenance at a time when I can least afford it.
U wouldn't hit a girl with glasses, would u?
Potachos!!
Bubba found a stick. He's very proud of himself.
This cracked me up... soo cute! http://www.dogwork.com/dogsnow/
Played soccer tonight :)
Does anyone wanna play soccer in a couple hours? Hit me up!
It's dog park time.
First time at Cat and the Fiddle & first time at Silverlake Lounge... tonight is full of live music.
Going to see @Greglaswell at the Hotel Cafe...
Correction, LAST night I dreamt about cheerleading....
Tonight I dreamt about cheerleading. I wonder what Mrs. Fant is up to...
errands and cleaning.
White pizza and garlic nuts.
Completely out of commission.
Getting rick rolled by the 80s music station on tv
Playing pool downtown with the boys.
Bubba peed on his sweater. Probably not an accident.
It's so cold, I just had to.... please don't judge me... it was just too cold in my apartment... I put Bubba in a sweater.
Who wants to play dodgeball tonight? 8pm? Let me know.
Giving Bubba his xmas present: his yearly vaccination.
Just won a stare-dpwn contest with an opossum.
watching improv at Upright Citizens Brigade :)
Working out.
Watching Rocco DeLuca rock out at Spaceland :)
Shiat.
GO BUCKEYES!! Oh god, please hold them...
Go Buckeyes!
Today's a good day for a hike.
Being a geeky gamer.
Just saw Seven Pounds... @djsteen was probably jizzing from all the 7 references. Great movie!
I feel like a footlong...
Filing a police report for my stolen license plate.
♫ Someone got his ego hurt ♫ ... haha, the male ego is such a fragile thing.
My front license plate got stolen off my car. Seriously. Who does that?
7 Grand for pool.
Playing pool. When am I not?...
